member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.AsyncResultVoid.SetAsCompleted(System.Exception,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the status of the asynchronous call to completed.
member.param: The that was thrown by the executed method. If no pendingException was thrown, pass a reference.
True if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise, false.
member.remarks:
If the synchronous completion of the call is detected in the delegate, it is probable that the thread that initiated the asynchronous operation is the current thread.
Notes to Implementers:
Most implementers of the interface will not use this property and should return .

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.EnumHelper.ToString(System.Enum)
member.summary:
Returns a string value representing the specified enum value. If the enum value has the applied, its parameters are used to generate the string value. If those parameters do not result in a valid string value or the attribute is not applied, the enum value is tested for the . If that attribute is applied, the field is used as the string value.
If the is not applied or does not result in a valid string value, the enum value is tested for the . If that attribute is applied, the field is used as the string value.
If none of the attributes are applied or result in a valid string value, the default method is used.
member.param: The enum value that must be converted into a string value.
member.returns: The string representation of the enum value.

member.summary:

This method will automatically check if there are any eventhandlers subscribed to and it will automatically propagate the call the the appropriate thread.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Workflow.OnStart
member.summary: Contains the actual start-up logic. The default implementation is empty, subclasses will have to provide the implementation by overriding this method. Implementers of this method do not have to check the state of the workflow or change the state of the workflow as this is already done by the public method.
member.remarks: If the implementer detects a situation in which it cannot be started, it should throw an . This will cause the Workflow to move to the state.
